game.name: Convenience Store Simulator
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 스테레오 사운드, 서라운드 사운드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A game about running and managing your own convenience store. Work the register, brew coffee, stock shelves, and hire staff while decorating your space. Expand your business through scaling upgrades and long-term progression.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A game about running and managing your own convenience store. Work the register, brew coffee, stock shelves, and hire staff while decorating your space. Expand your business through scaling upgrades and long-term progression.
